attributes.action: Every British Dday veteran living or dead to receive an honorary Knighthood.
attributes.additional_details: The Second World War, the D day events
attributes.background: On the 75th anniversary of the D day landings, with only a few veterans remaining, we respectfully ask Her Majesty to bestow this honour for the greatest generation that lived, who fought for freedom and for whom many will never grow old.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because it asks for someone to be nominated for an honour. 

Members of the public can nominate people for honours directly. You can find out how to nominate someone for an honour here:

https://www.gov.uk/honours
